casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Melvin Lee WHITE, Jr. No. 505P96-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Ms. Kristin D. Parks, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for White, Melvin Lee, Jr. Mr. Richard McNeil, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for White, Melvin Lee, Jr. Mr. L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mr. Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 19th of July 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Craven County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
